rule_compliance_audit.description: Review .cursor/rules/*.mdc vs current Sudoku scope and docs. Ensure rules match the repo's actual tech stack and docs sources of truth.

dependency_updates_review.description: Review and update dependencies (Expo, React Native, Supabase, testing toolchain) per versioning/toolchain rules.

code_quality_review.description: Review code quality (lint, types, test stability) and track high-signal improvements.

security_audit.description: Security audit and vulnerability check (dependency advisories, Supabase RLS policies review).

performance_review.description: Performance review (grid input latency, generation time, startup).

documentation_updates.description: Ensure docs stay current with implementation and decisions.

schema_documentation_sync.description: Sync schema documentation with migrations (SQLite + Supabase). Ensure new tables/columns are documented with intent and constraints.

supabase_migrations_review.description: Review Supabase schema/migrations and RLS policies for correctness and security.
